metadata.title: CVE-2018-18455 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: The GfxImageColorMap class in GfxState.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via acrafted pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftoppm.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
